`{bm-disable-all}`

 * Less than testing 190 and 195...
   * Test digits 1 and 1...
   * 1 == 1 -- continuing testing
   * Test digits 9 and 9...
   * 9 == 9 -- continuing testing
   * Test digits 0 and 5...
   * 0 < 5 -- 190 is less than 195

`{bm-enable-all}`
